message.text: For a period of time, when an attack is blocked, a shockwave will be emitted. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the effect. LV.6: Increases damage.</COL>

Channel a light from your rod towards the enemy. Slowly accumulates the Torpor debilitation over time. With more than 1 Force Gauge, the effect will increase. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases the rate of Torpor accumulation. LV.6: Increases range of the effect.</COL>

Channel a light from your rod towards the enemy. Slowly accumulates the Sleep debilitation over time. With more than 1 Force Gauge, the effect will increase. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases the rate of Sleep accumulation. LV.6: Increases range of the effect.</COL>

Rush forward with your greatshield, blowing away enemies. With more than 1 Force Gauge, the effect will increase. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases moving distance and number of hits.</COL>

Decreases attribute damage taken and debilitation build-up for nearby allies. (Determined by element granted to rod) With more than 1 Force Gauge, the duration will increase. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration and power of the effect. LV.6: Increases range of the effect.</COL>
Shake the earth, staggering enemies in a wide range. Staggers large enemies and some formidable foes. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Shortens casting time. LV.6: Increases range of the effect.</COL>

Use magic to create an anchor, binding the enemy. Inflicts a weakening effect to large and formidable enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases stamina consumption. LV.6: Increases range of the effect.</COL>
Create walls of magic that increase the range of your shield's ability to block. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the effect. LV.6: Makes the effect protect all of your sides.</COL>
